name: Crash Landing on You
description: A South Korean heiress accidentally crash-lands in North Korea and meets an army officer who helps her hide.

name: Itaewon Class
description: An ex-con and his friends fight to make their ambitious dreams for their street bar a reality.

name: Goblin
description: A 939-year-old immortal goblin meets a girl who can see ghosts and is destined to be his bride.

name: Kingdom
description: In a kingdom defeated by corruption and famine, a mysterious plague spreads to turn the infected into monsters.

name: Vincenzo
description: A Korean-Italian mafia lawyer returns to his homeland and delivers a dose of justice.

name: My Mister
description: A young woman with a difficult life forms a bond with a middle-aged man facing his own struggles.

name: Start-Up
description: Young entrepreneurs aspire to launch virtual dreams into reality as they compete for success and love in Korea's high-tech industry.

name: Hotel Del Luna
description: The manager of a hotel for the dead meets a woman who has been cursed to run the hotel for centuries.

name: It's Okay to Not Be Okay
description: An unconventional romance between a psychiatric ward caregiver and a children's book author.

name: Reply 1988
description: A nostalgic look back at life in 1988 through the lives of five families living in the same neighborhood.

name: Stranger Things
description: A prosecutor with a lack of empathy teams up with a passionate detective to uncover corruption in the legal system.

name: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family and infiltrate their home.

name: Dangal
description: A former wrestler trains his daughters to become world-class wrestlers.

name: 3 Idiots
description: Three friends embark on a quest to discover the true meaning of life.

name: The Handmaiden
description: A con woman and a maid's elaborate plan gets complicated by unexpected romance.

name: Midnight Diner: Tokyo Stories
description: A late-night diner in Tokyo serves food and comfort to its eclectic clientele.

name: Ratatouille
description: A rat with a passion for cooking secretly becomes a renowned chef in Paris.

name: Boys Over Flowers
description: A poor girl gets entangled with a group of wealthy, popular boys at her new school.

name: Café Midnight
description: A late-night café owner helps customers navigate their personal dilemmas.

name: Memories of the Alhambra
description: A businessman and an AR game developer become entangled in a mysterious adventure in Granada.

name: The King: Eternal Monarch
description: A modern-day emperor crosses into a parallel world to close the door between their two realms.

name: Tumbbad
description: A mythological horror film about a man's quest to find a hidden treasure in the village of Tumbbad.

name: Jab We Met
description: A chance encounter on a train leads to a romance between a troubled businessman and a cheerful young woman.

name: Memento
description: A man with short-term memory loss uses notes and tattoos to hunt for his wife's killer.

name: Secret Garden
description: A body-swapping fantasy romance between a wealthy man and a stuntwoman.

name: The Queen’s Gambit
description: An orphaned chess prodigy struggles with addiction and her past as she rises to the top of the chess world.

name: Psycho
description: A secretary ends up at a remote motel after embezzling money, where she encounters a disturbed motel owner.

name: Coffee Prince
description: A young woman disguises herself as a man to get a job at a coffee shop, where she falls for her boss.

name: The Crown
description: The story of the reign of Queen Elizabeth II, covering her early years as monarch.

name: The Great Indian Kitchen
description: A woman struggles with the constraints of traditional gender roles and expectations within her household.

name: Mirzapur
description: A story of power and crime in the town of Mirzapur, focusing on two brothers and their involvement in the criminal underworld.

name: Gully Boy
description: A street rapper from Mumbai rises to fame while facing the struggles of his challenging life.

name: The Family Man
description: An intelligence officer balances his secretive job with family life while dealing with domestic and international threats.

name: Sardar Udham
description: A biographical film about Udham Singh, who avenged the Jallianwala Bagh massacre.

name: Sacred Games
description: A Mumbai cop uncovers a dark underworld while investigating the disappearance of a notorious gangster.

name: Delhi Crime
description: A gripping series based on the real-life Delhi gang rape case and the investigation that followed.

name: Kahaani
description: A pregnant woman searches for her missing husband in Kolkata, unraveling a complex mystery.

name: Ludo
description: A dark comedy that weaves together four stories about chance, love, and misadventures.

name: Andhadhun
description: A blind pianist becomes embroiled in a complex plot of murder and deceit.

name: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
description: A devout Hindu embarks on a journey to reunite a mute Pakistani girl with her family.

name: Piku
description: A quirky story of a daughter managing her elderly father’s health and her own life.

name: Sita Ramam
description: A timeless love story set in the backdrop of historical events and personal struggles.

name: Raazi
description: A young Indian woman marries a Pakistani military officer to gather intelligence for her country.

name: Koi... Mil Gaya
description: A young man befriends an alien who has arrived on Earth and helps him return home.

name: Natsamrat
description: A celebrated stage actor faces the trials and tribulations of his later years and family dynamics.

name: Shutter Island
description: A U.S. Marshal investigates a psychiatric facility after a patient goes missing.

name: The Man From Nowhere
description: A reclusive man with a dark past goes on a mission to save a young girl kidnapped by a criminal gang.

name: Madhuri
description: A story of a young girl’s struggles with her family and societal expectations.

name: Tamasha
description: A young man grapples with his identity and past as he navigates through life and relationships in this visually engaging film.
